response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
